Sweet_Gem_Tea_description: Sweet gem berries combined with minced tea leaves to have a dreamy sweetness.
Gem_Coffee_description: A drink that instantly fills the mouth with fruity sweetness and caffeine.
Sweet_Gem_Parfait_description: This ice-cold dessert is filled with wonderful sweetness and is perfect on a hot summer day.
Statue_of_Old_Master_Cannoli_description: Old Master Cannoli still seeks the sweetest taste, try to offer him lots of sugar in exchange for rare seeds!
